title: Chargeback
body:
Do riot send you an email right away when they receive a chargeback? Cause I bought RP from a friend's card paid him back in cash, but now he filed a dispute to the bank and riot has suspended my account, but they havent sent me anything to my email regarding the chargeback, not sure what to do now? Can someone shed a light on when riot will atleast give me a notice of what going on. Its already been a week since the suspension
 Thanks guys

replies.body: Due to the sensitive nature of account and billing information, we can't really help here on the boards.  Instead, hit us up through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team can look into this for you and give you the context to get things back in order.  Hang tight until then!
